name: GoBLING
description:
*USE CHROME TO ENABLE AUDIO*

Help this little gobling get rich by steal-- by COLLECTING money from the wayfarers!

Game made in 6 days for Weekly Game Jam 163 - Theme: TYCOON

Controls explained in tutorial (recommended)

Credits:
-Art and code: ricenoodles
-Music: FoxSynergy and cosmicgem829
-Sound FX: opengameart

Thank you for playing!
